channel.title: Key auth loader downloading
channel.description: I have a program that uses a loader that needs a auth key to use. I also have a program that is a CMD prompt. I basically want this program to be able to be run on others computers and run the command prompt without them having to download anything special of any sort. Just my exe and that’s it. I dont have any source code for the file tho. I can send my loader code if needed tho

item.title: Key auth loader downloading
item.dc:creator: BlazeEscape
item.description:
Basically. As an example. Cheats. You know how they typically have like a key authorization so people cant just sell them to others? Kind of like that where the main program is unable to be opened without first using the program I created. I already have the key authorization loader completed I just need a viable way to put my software that I want behind the pay wall in the code. The only issue is I don’t have the source code since It was done such a long time ago. But I basically want my loader to open up this exe file without letting them access the software without the loader. Sorry if that still doesn’t make sense.

Read full topic
